items.title: Anker fall sale now live at up to 50% off: Charging stations, MagSafe chargers, bundles, mystery gifts, more
items.summary:
Anker’s fall Prime Day sale may have ended, but the brand is keeping the savings live on the website as part of its fall sale event. Alongside markdowns on pretty much everything from its latest Nano charging units to Prime chargers, MagSafe stands, cables, and more, it is now offering additional savings with $10 off at $99, $15 off $129, and $25 off at $159. Those offers also join a series of Mystery gifts and bundle savings when you pair multiple units, so it’s safe to say that there’s plenty of savings to be had by cashing in on the deals now live and waiting for you right here. Head below for more details.

items.title: Today’s game deals: MLB The Show 25 from $24, Silent Hill 2 $40, Borderlands 4 20% off, more
items.summary:
We are already deep into the MBL playoffs, but if you’re looking to play along with them, Amazon is offering some all-time low pricing on MLB The Show 25. The PS5 edition is down at $29.83 Prime shipped and Xbox Series X|S version is now down at $23.98 from the regular $70 list price – they have both been down at more like $50 as of late and are now up to 52% less than that. The Switch version is also on sale at $39.99, or 33% off, which lands within $10 of the one-time Amazon low. 

Before you head below for some hangover Prime Day deals still live, some other highlights today include Silent Hill 2 on PS5 down at $39.90 via Amazon and Borderlands 4 at $56 via the PlayStation Store (20% off the regular $70 list).

This one has fetched as much as $281 in recent months, and today’s deal knocks it down with a $136 discount. It’s now within $5 of its all-time low price, making this a great time to snag it.
